name: Ac'vuk
effect:
Nothrog
At end of turn: If Ac'vuk did not inflict any wounds on an opposing character this turn, kill him.
"Tactics? All the tactics I need are right here!"

name: Accelerated Attack
effect:
Tactics
Spend Order: Target a non-stunned lower Level character you control: Move the target forward one rank, if possible. The target may perform a melee strike (base +3 ATK).
"He pushed off our shields, vaulted over the enemy phalanx and wreaked havoc in their midst. Such style. Such breavery." - Lady Winifred

name: Alanna
effect:
Free Kingdoms
Spend React: After a Free Kingdoms targets a strike: The strike gains +2 to the die roll, is an Earth action and spell.
"What scandalous attire for one gifted with the power of the earth." - Aithlynn

name: Alaya
effect:
Mercenary • Seer
React: After Alaya enters play, shuffle a card from your hand into your deck: Draw a card.
"The Chosen eye with mistrust the prophetic power of Alaya, as they cannot fathom it. They would take her life, but the Thralls protect her at all costs." - Graham Heyward

name: Amand d'Ilchant
effect:
The Chosen
Amand gains +3 ATK and AC while there is a Daemon in this rank.
Spend Order: Kill Amand: Move a Daemon you control forward one rank.
"The Thessyrians have captured the Emperor's nephew and... there can be no quarter now." - Aurelius Rellion

name: Ar'dak
effect:
Nothrog • Unique
Spend Order: Target lower Level non-stunned Nothrog within two ranks performs an attack without spending or gains +8 ATK and POWERATTACK +8. This is a Tactics action.
"I cannot run, but I can fight! And so can you."

name: As'sa
effect:
The Chosen • Daemon • Planar
Spend React: Once per turn, after a The Chosen within two ranks declares an action whose payment includes killing a Thrall: Perform a melee strike, that inflicts no wounds, against an equal or lower Level non-Warlord character. If the strike hits, the target gains the Thrall trait and is under your control for the duration of the action.
"It hasn't been seen since." - Samanya

name: Atheris
effect:
Elf • Undead / Priest of Blood
Atheris is a cleric and a rogue.
After a non-Undead within one rank is killed, remove it from the game.
React: Once per turn, after Atheris kills an equal or higher Level character: Atheris permanently gains +1 HP.

name: Aureliane
effect:
Deverenian
Spend Order: Remove a wound from an adjacent higher Level Deverenian.
"Sire, the common soldiers are wounded and weak. Give me time to tend to them as I tended you."

name: Azam
effect:
Mercenary
If your Warlord is a Mercenary, Azam gains RIDING +4.
Azam may equip Steeds regardless of class restrictions.
"Yes, I can break these beasts in for you. At a price, of course."

name: Azelot il Dawud
effect:
Mercenary • Summoner
Spend React: Before a Monster within one rank is killed: Search your deck for a character with the same name, shuffle your deck and put the character on top.
"Beasts are bountiful."

name: Backflip
effect:
React: After this rogue is targeted with a melee strike: Move backward one rank.
React: After this rogue is targed by a melee strike: Gain +3 AC until end of turn.
"You're no ordinary slave girl, are you?" - Redu Tam

name: Banyon
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Druid • Monster • Unique
May not equip items.
While in this rank, fighters gain +4 ATK, rogues gain +4 AC, other clerics gain +1 HP, and Lycanthropes have an additional melee strike (base +0 ATK) when they attack.

name: Bar'rax
effect:
The Chosen • Daemon • Planar
May not start in play.
You must spend a The Chosen you control for Bar'rax to enter play from your hand.
Order: Kill a Thrall: Move forward one rank or remove a wound from Bar'rax.

name: Bataar
effect:
Deverenian
React: Once per turn, after a character you control performs a Fire action: Perform a +4 ranged strike. This is a Fire action.
"I have found a people just to my liking." - Yavlo the Kindled

name: Beacon of Salvation
effect:
Unique
If this cleric is a Cantor, he gains CHARISMA +5.
Spend Order: Choose ATK or AC: While in this rank, other characters gain a bonus equal to this cleric's Level to that stat, until end of turn.
"The daemons fear the light." - Sister Amanda

name: Belt of Bear
effect:
POWERATTACK +5
If this fighter is a Barbarian, he may perform the POWERATTACK feat an additional time per turn.
"You need to let Bear become part of you for it to work properly." - Hrunting

name: Beyond the Grave
effect:
React: Before this fighter is killed: Perform a melee strike. If this fighter is Level 4 or higher, he gains POWERATTACK +7 for the strike.
React: After this fighter is targeted with an action to spend or stun him: Succeed with a Will check (DC 17) to cancel the action.

name: Blood Price
effect: Order: This wizard suffers a wound: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. You may choose a wizard spell and attach it to this wizard, as if it had been successfully scribed. Shuffle your deck.
"Very effective, and very dangerous for mortals." - Sanga-Kish

name: Blunder
effect:
Dwarf
Spend Order: Until end of turn, Blunder gains the ability, "React: After target character targets a character in this rank with a melee strike: The target must succeed with a Dexterity save (DC 10) or suffer a wound. This is a Trap."
"He's a specialist for traps. If only he would not need all that patching up..." - Kohn

name: Bog Fiend
effect:
Mercenary • Undead
React: After target character is hit with a melee strike by Bog Fiend: Spend the target.
"Not a pure ghoul like our Severed of Flesh, but some being rising naturally within the swamp. I wonder why." - Raclesis

name: Bribe
effect: Order: Put a character into play from your hand, ignoring loyalty penalties. If your Warlord is a Mercenary, you may reduce the target's entering rank by one, and it may create an illegal rank if there is already at least one character in the entering rank.

name: Brigid
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Illusionist
Order: Once per turn, discard a spell, target a character withing two ranks: The target must succeed with a magic save (DC 18) or become spent. If the target critically fails, or fails by 10 or more, stun the target instead.
"How she still charms them is a mystery to me." - Talin Tzin

name: Burrowing Basilisk
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
React: Once per turn, after target character is hit with a melee strike by Basilisk: The target suffers one wound the next time he spends or stuns this turn.
"Poisonous creatures from the deep desert, their bite can be deadly long after you have slain one." - Lady Tornhawk

name: Caliphate Mail
effect:
Armor • Unique
React: Once per turn, before another target character within one rank suffers wounds: The target gains +1 HP until end of turn.
"The script says the Caliph was the High Priest in ancient Thessyria and that with the office came an armor of extraordinary power." - Samanya Dumisa

name: Calm
effect: Spend Order: Target an equal or lower Level character in the front rank of any formation: Spend the target.
"You mortals know nothing but strife. You need to know your true enemy, and unite against him!" - Niobe

name: Cardinal Scelus
effect:
Deverenian • Seer • Unique
Order: Once per turn: Move a Deverenian you control forward or backward one rank.
"The fat schemer had fallen out of favor when Rhawn ascended to the throne. Now he is back, picking riches out of ruins." - Magellan

name: Castux
effect:
+2 Skill
Familiar • Daemon
Order: Once per turn, inflict a wound on a character within one rank: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to the wounded character's Level (gain +2 if the character was a Thrall).
"They favor mistresses and are extremely jealous." - Atiratu

name: Causticus
effect:
Mercenary • Dragon • Unique / Adult
May not equip items.
Order: Once per turn, move forward or backward one rank.
Order: Once per turn, target a character within two ranks: The target must succeed with a poison save (DC 17) or suffer -5 ATK, AC, and Skill until end of turn.

name: Choke Hold
effect: React: After target character targets this rogue with a strike: If the strike misses, melee strikes against the target gain +3 ATK until end of turn.
"Get him now!"

name: Create Golem
effect:
Dwarves gain +1 Level for casting this spell.
Spend Order: remove up to one item and up to one character in your discard pile from the game: Put this card into play adjacent to this wizard as a Level 4 classless character with the Construct trait, +3/+0 ATK, 12 AC, +2 Skill, and 2 HP. If you removed an item, it permanently gains +4 ATK and AC. If you removed a character, it permanently gains +1 HP and has the removed character's feats (at +0) and classes.

name: Crypt Guardian
effect:
Elf • Undead
Crypt Guardian gains +2 ATK while performing a melee strike against a character with the Poison trait.
React: After target character is hit with a melee strike by Crypt Guardian: The target permanently gains the Poison trait.
"Run! The crypt is guarded." - Blunder

name: Cuirass of the Elements
effect:
Armor
This character gains +3 Skill and AC while targeted with Water, Fire, Earth, or Air actions and +3 Skill against poison saves.
"It was used by the old empire's messengers - didn't feel cold in the passes nor heat in the desert. Not to mention the poisonous jungle frogs." - Alaya

name: Cyrus Netheryn
effect:
Elf • Necromancer • SCRIBE +6
React: After Cyrus enters play, kill a Level X Elf: Put an Undead of Level X or lower into play from your discard pile.
"A fine vessel. Allow me a moment to assemble a crew."

name: Dark Heart of Kylnion
effect:
SCRIBE +3
Order: Succeed with a SCRIBE check (DC 20) to attach a spell from your discard pile to this wizard, as if it had been successfully scribed, otherwise suffer a wound. Remove Dark Heart from the game.
"I found it where you said it would be, master. But I nary know what to do with it." - The Lady of Pain

name: Dark Monolith
effect:
Elf • Undead • Siege • Unique
May not equip items.
Before Monolith is killed: Reveal all face down cards attached to Monolith. Put up to 7 Levels of revealed Elves into play, if possible. Remove Monolith and all other revealed cards from the game.
Order: Once per turn, attach a card from your discard pile face down to Monolith: Target character within two ranks must succeed with a Magic save (DC 16) or suffer a wound.

name: Dautien
effect:
Deverenian • Illusionist • DEFEND +6
React: Once per turn, after target character targets Dautien with a melee strike that was redirected: Perform a melee strike against the target. This strike is a Fire action.

name: Dayaa
effect:
Familiar
Druids with Dayaa equipped gain +2 Skill.
Order: Once per turn, spend Dayaa: Perform a +4 melee strike that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits spend the target. This strike does not gain any ATK bonuses from this cleric's items.
"So like the lost ones we held dear." - Pehtu

name: Decompose
effect:
Poison
Order: Target a lower-Level opposing character within three ranks: The target must succed with a Magic save (DC 18) or attach Decompose. While the target has one or more Decompose attached, he gains the Poison trait and must discard a card to ready.
"Now you know how it feels." - Raclesis

name: Desecration
effect:
Poison
Spend Order: Remove up to 3 characters in an opposing discard pile from the game, target an equal number of characters within one rank: Each target must succeed with a poison save (DC 12, 17 if the target has the Poison trait) or suffer a wound.

name: Devlin Cormac
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Scout
React: After a character you control performs a melee strike that hit: Move Devlin forward or backwards one rank.
"It turned out the woodsmen, light of foot, survived the longest." - Logan

name: Dirk
effect:
Weapon
This rogue's melee strikes ignore AC bonuses from Armor, Helms, and Shields.
"Always little spots there are you can sneak this one in to find weak, weak flesh, yes." - Gee'ch

name: Double Shot
effect: Order: Stun a ready Bow equipped to this rogue: Perform two +4 ranged strikes.
"Bah, these goblin bows have a lousy pull, Scyrax!" - Yemat

name: Dragon Pipes
effect:
If this rogue is a Bard, he may perform Fire actions regardless of class restrictions.
React: Before targeting a strike, discard a card: The strike gains +3 to the die roll, is a Fire action and a spell.
"Whoa!" - Keziah

name: Dreamsand
effect:
Trap
React: After target ready character is targeted with a melee strike by this rogue, spend Dreamsand: The target must succeed with a Magic save (DC 13) or become spent.

name: Dunewalker's Staff
effect:
Weapon • Shield
React: After target character is hit with a melee strike by this cleric, spend Dunewalker's Staff: Move the target backward one rank (two ranks if this cleric is a Druid).
"It unleashes the power of the Desert Winds, revered by the people of the Sands." - Azam

name: Ebonscourge
effect:
Mercenary • Dragon • Unique • SCRIBE +4 / Adult
May not equip items.
Order: Once per turn: Move forward or backward one rank.
Order: Once per turn, target a character within one rank: The target must succeed with a Magic save (DC 15) or suffer two wounds.
"Even The Chosen fear him." - Logan

name: Eldoreth
effect:
Elf • Necromancer
Eldoreth is a rogue and a wizard and enters play as if he was Level 4.
Order: Once per turn, discard a card from your hand: Perform a +4 ranged strike. If the discarded card was a Level 1 or 2 Undead, put the Undead into play in your front rank from your discard pile.

name: Fancy
effect:
Dwarf
Spend Order: Ready target item equipped to a Dwarf in your front rank.
"Ornaments were more precious to the Thessyrian court than a straight blade. He still works that that way." - Sigurdur

name: Fayed Dythanus
effect:
Elf • Undead
React: After Fayed enters play: Cast a spell from your discard pile. Remove the spell from the game.
"Dythanus has passed many secrets down his line. They need to be ours." - Tepheroth

name: Final Blessing
effect:
React: After target character pays the costs of an action to retrieve cards from a discard pile: Cancel the action. The target suffers a wound.
React: Before target character suffers wounds: The target gains +1 HP until end of turn.
"Not Yet." - Thekk Rockbender

name: Fire Seeds
effect:
Fire
Spend Order: Target up to three characters within one rank: Remove up to one wound from each target you control. Each opposing target must succeed with a Magic save (DC 7 + this cleric's Skill) or suffer a wound.
"A gift from the gods. They heal or they destroy, it's up to you." - Niobe

name: Flank Attack
effect: Spend Order: Spend a rogue within one rank: Perform a +5 melee strike that inflicts an additional wound.
"A simple diversion put them off guard. These are not enemies, they are chaff!" - Set'rokh

name: Flavien Genecourt
effect:
Deverenian
Flavien and adjacent higher Level Deverenians gain +1 Level for equipping Steeds.
Flavien gains +1 HP while he has a Steed equipped.
"His love for horses alone keeps our knights in action." - Aurelius

name: Flayer of Dreams
effect:
The Chosen • Daemon • Planar • Unique / Bar-Bochol
Spend Order: Kill up to three Thralls, target all opposing characters in an adjacent rank: Each target must succeed with a Fortitude save (DC 13 + the combined Levels of the killed Thralls) or suffer a wound.
"To behold him is to lose your mind."

name: Flying Carpet
effect:
Steed
Order: Spend Flying Carpet, target up to one adjacent character: Move both this wizard and any target forward or backward one rank.
"The only one left supposedly carried the last princess of Thessyria to safety. She was never heard from again." - Samanya Dumisa

name: Focus
effect:
Dwarf
React: Once per turn, after target Dwarf readies during the decree phase: The target performs an attack, spending as normal.
"Be relentless in your attack and we will see forgiveness."

name: Forest People
effect:
The Chosen • Thrall
React: Up to four times per turn, after a character you control is killed: Forest people gains +1 Level until end of turn.
"They simply call themselves the forest people. For The Chosen, they were easy prey - already they offered gruesome sacrifices to their gods." - Ursala Yscar

name: From the Shadows
effect: Spend Order: Move forward one rank. If this rogue is now in your front rank and not stunned, he may perform an attack without spending. Assassins gain +4 ATK for the duration of the attack.
"Die quietly, traitor. I must surprise your master." - Taisia

name: Gee'ch
effect:
Nothrog
While performing a melee strike against a character with an item equipped, Gee'ch gains +4 ATK.
"They lord it over us with their shiny magic items. I for one am not going to take it anymore!"

name: Ghast
effect:
Elf • Undead
React: After target character targets Ghast with a melee strike: The target must succeed with a poison save (DC 14) or suffer -2 ATK and gain the Poison trait, until end of turn.

name: Ghed Nuri
effect:
Deverenian • Stormwraith • Planar
React: After a melee strike targets a Deverenian you control: Put Ghed Nuri into play from your hand adjacent to the target. If you do, redirect the strike to Ghed Nuri, if possible.

name: Ghed Romus
effect:
Deverenian • Planar • Stormwraith
Order: Spend a cleric: Romus gains +4 ATK until end of turn.
"The Storm doth once again show interest in thine affairs, Inquisitor."

name: Grace Heyward
effect:
Free Kingdoms
React: After Grace hits with a melee strike. The strike inflicts no wounds: Perform a +3 ranged strike.
"I have never seen one so skilled with a simple dagger." - Devlin

name: Gravity Rod
effect: Order: Spend Gravity Rod, target a character within four ranks: The target must succeed with a Magic save (DC 14) or count as an additional character for determining illegal ranks until end of turn. Characters may choose to fail the save. This is an Earth action.

name: Green Dragon Essence
effect:
Order: Equip Essence to an adjacent character, regardless of class restrictions.
Order: Destroy Essence: Perform a +3 ranged strike that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, until end of turn, the target suffers -3 ATK, AC, and Skill and may not maneuver.

name: Grimur
effect:
Dwarf • Seer • Unique
Spend React: Once per turn, before target non-stunned Dwarf suffers wounds from an action by an opposing character: Ready the target or the target performs a melee strike.
"I followed your advice. Last night Kor talked to me. We are not godless anymore!"

name: Guillaume Rellion
effect:
Deverenian • Bard / Herald
Order: Once per turn, target a higher Level Deverenian: Until end of turn, whenever the target rolls a die, if the die roll is less than 6 and not a Critical Failure, change the die roll to 6.
"Even the ones too young to be squires get embrodied in the war now. When is it going to end?" - Brymin

name: Hallur
effect:
Dwarf • Unique
Hallur may performs Earth action cards regardless of class restrictions and gains +1 Level for performing them.
Spend Order: Until end of turn, Hallur gains +5 AC and does not stun when falling forward.
"The earth still listened, e'en when the gods wouldn't answer."

name: Hallvardur
effect:
Dwarf
React: Once per turn after Hallvardur equips a Weapon: Ready Hallvardur.
Order: Destroy an equipped Level X Weapon: Perform a +X melee strike.
"His demeanor proves him a royal guardian, but what is he hiding from us?" - King Alaric

name: Havat-lahn Stance
effect:
Stance
This fighter has an additional melee strike (base +1 ATK) when he attacks.
"The Narawati taught me this stance many years ago. It may be all that now remains of their culture, for all I know." - Brymin

name: Heart of Embers
effect:
Unique
React: Once per turn, after target character suffers exactly one wound from a spell cast by this wizard: The target suffers one wound.
"Ohhh, that's a hot one!" - Muddflek

name: Heartstrings
effect:
Order: Spend Heartstrings: Target lower Level non-Warlord character must succeed with a Will save (DC 15) or he may not attack until end of turn.
Order: Spend Heartstrings: If this rogue is a Bard, target lower Level non-Warlord character may not attack until end of turn.

name: Hovrakk
effect:
Nothrog • POWERATTACK +6
React: Once per turn, after Hovrakk performs a melee strike that killed, target a character that was adjacent to the killed character: Succeed with a POWERATTACK check (DC 20) to inflict a wound on the target.

name: Hurl
effect:
Dwarf • Barbarian
Order: Once per turn destroy a Weapon equipped to Hurl: Perform a +5 ranged strike.
"He has taken a liking to Sigurdur's axes." - King Alaric

name: Ice Gargoyle
effect:
Dwarf • Gargoyle
React: Once per turn, after target character targets Ice Gargoyle with a melee strike: The target must succeed with a Magic save (DC 13) or become stunned. This is a Water action.
"Vicious ones best left alone." - Thekk

name: Icy Surge
effect:
Water
Order: Perform a +5 ranged strike. After the strike, the target must succeed with a Magic save (DC 12) or become spent.
Spend Order: Perform a +8 ranged strike. After the strike, the target must succeed with a Magic save (DC 5 + this wizard's Skill) or become stunned.

name: Imperial Chariot
effect:
Steed • CHARISMA +5
Order: Spend Imperial Chariot: Move forward one rank.
"The prince's chariot was enchanted to inspire his followers and thus made him near invincible in open battle." - Samanya Dumisa

name: Improved Bull Rush
effect:
Order: Move forward one rank.
React: After this fighter moves into your front rank, target an opposing character within one rank: The target must succeed with a Dexterity save (DC 6 + this fighter's ATK) or move backward one rank and become spent.

name: Improvisation
effect: React: Before this character makes a melee strike or skill check roll: Replace his base ATK with his base Skill for the roll, or vice-versa. If the strike hits or the check succeeds, draw a card.
"I didn't need a light source anyway."

name: Incendiary Glove
effect:
Weapon • Gauntlet • Cursed
React: Once per turn, after target character targets this wizard with a melee strike: Perform a +3 melee strike against the target. This is a Fire action.
Order: Spend Incendiary Glove: Perform a +3 ranged strike. This is a Fire action.
"It seems to have a life of its own." - Yavlo

name: Incessant Waves
effect:
Water
Order: Target up to two characters in an adacent rank: Perform a +5 ranged strike that does not inflict wounds at each target. If the strike hits, spend the target.
"He who thinks to drown, cannot fight." - Niobe

name: Inquisitor Dmitir
effect:
Deverenian Warlord • Seer
Dmitir gains +1 to his Initiative rolls for each Seer you control.
React: After you win initiative: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Put any number of those cards at the bottom of your deck. Return the rest in the same order.
React: Once per turn, before another Deverenian you control makes a die roll: The die roll is a 10.

name: Jacob Windrider
effect:
Mercenary • Unique / Dark Horseman
React: After Jacob enters play: He permanently gains the non-Warlord traits, class(es), and alignment of your Warlord.
"Ever been in an inverted dive with a plummeting Hippogriff?"

name: Jethro
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Lycanthrope
Order: Once per game, inflict one wound on Jethro: Jethro permanently has an additional melee strike (base +2 ATK) when he attacks.
"Do not fight it. It is no curse, but nature's loving embrace." - Pehtu

name: Jistik
effect:
Nothrog
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike. After the strike, if it hit, the target must succeed with a poison save (DC 10) or suffer a wound.
"Fascinating new poisons your forest offers, troll lord."

name: Kast
effect:
Nothrog
Spend React: After target Nothrog moves into your front rank: The target performs an attack, spending as normal.
"Maybe it's time to expand my ambitions beyond this wood..." - Krenthor Gouge

name: Kornell Calix
effect:
Elf
While one or more Kornell Calix are in your discard pile, opposing characters with the Poison trait suffer -2 ATK.
"The frog, like the spider, contains killing power beyond its stature. Like the elves, it can kill long after its own death."

name: Korvos
effect:
Nothrog • Siege • 1 Charge
Spend Order: Put a Charge on or remove a Charge from a Nothrog Siege you control.
Order: Once per turn, remove a Charge: Perform a +4 ranged strike.
"Found 'dis Flashstick, Scyrax."

name: Krenthor's Club
effect:
Weapon
React: Once per turn, before this fighter makes a melee strike roll, suffer -5 ATK for the strike: The strike inflicts an additional wound.
"Krenthor found deep in mud. Very hard. Bash all."

name: Lady Tornhawk
effect:
Mercenary
If your Warlord is a Mercenary, Lady Tornhawk gains +1 HP.
Lady Tornhawk inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes against Monsters.

name: Lady Winifred
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Paladin
While Winifred is in your discard pile your characters do not receive any bonuses or penalties from cards in any discard pile.
Order: Once per turn, remove a Free Kingdoms in your discard pile from the game: Move forward one rank.
"When all seems lost, we still have our faith."

name: Landshark
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
May not equip items.
React: After Landshark performs an attack that hit with the first two strikes: Perform a +7 melee strike that inflicts an additional wound.
"A mindless creature that never lets go. And the stench, once it swallows you... ugh." - Jonah the Burglar

name: Lasco Cormac
effect:
Free Kingdoms
Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike.
Spend React: Once per turn, after a Free Kingdoms within one rank performs a ranged strike: The Free Kigndoms performs a +0 ranged strike against the same target.
"Right into my sights..."

name: Lead by Example
effect: React: After this cleric kills an opposing character: Until end of turn, this cleric gains CHARISMA +5 and any adjacent characters gain +3 ATK.
"He is ever at the fore, proof that the gods are with us always." - Redu Bir

name: Liliane
effect:
Deverenian
Liliane's ranged strikes are Fire actions.
Spend Order: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to the number of Fire spells in your discard pile.
"Yavlo, teach me the secrets of fire and I am all yours."

name: Lilith
effect:
The Chosen • Thrall
React: Once per turn, after target character is hit with a melee strike by Lilith: The target must succeed with a poison save (DC 12 + 2 for each Daemon you control) or suffer a wound and become spent.

name: Lord Aurelius Rellion
effect:
Deverenian • Paladin • Unique / Rellion
Aurelius gains +1 ATK and AC for each other Paladin in this rank.
React: Once per turn, after a character spends a Steed to move: Ready the Steed. This is a Tactics action.

name: Lyconos
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Bard • Monster / Satyr
Lyconos is a cleric and a rogue and enters play as if he were Level 4.
Order: Once per turn, target a non-Warlord character within one rank: The target must succeed with a Magic save (DC 17) or he does not ready during the next ready phase.
"Inhibitions? What for?"

name: Mask of Command
effect:
CHARISMA +3
Order: Once per turn, spend Mask: This character may perform the CHARISMA feat an additional time this turn.
"Obey!" - Naram-Sin

name: Mistress Sanai
effect:
The Chosen • Unique
React: After a Thrall you control is killed as part of an action's payment: Put Charge on Sanai.
Order: Twice per turn, remove three Charges: Ready target The Chosen.
Order: Once per turn: Target non-Warlord character gains the Thrall trait.

name: Moira Dunbar
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Unique • DEFEND +6
React: Once per turn, after Moira succeeds with a DEFEND check: Ready Moira.
"My father died for the Duke of Andover. That end is the only part of his legacy I don't intend to uphold."

name: Naala
effect:
Elf / Vaneris
React: Before Naala is discarded from your hand, target a ready character: The target must succeed with a Magic save (DC 12) or become spent.
Spend Order: Perform a +0 ranged strike that does not inflict wounds. If the strike hits, spend the target.

name: Nemrah
effect:
The Chosen • Daemon • Planar
Spend Order: Target an equal or lower Level opposing character within two ranks: The target performs a melee strike (base +3 ATK) against a target of your choice.
"Nobody knows its real form." - Alaya

name: Noose
effect:
Dwarf • Scout
React: Once per turn, before a character makes a save roll from a Trap: The save gains +3 DC.
"His works don't look like much, but they are very effective in keeping our bellies full." - Gethseme Steelshard

name: Now I Am Not
effect:
Spend Order: Perform a melee strike. If this rogue is an Assassin, gain +5 ATK for the strike. If the strike killed the target, move to the target's former location, regardless of formation.
Order: Gain STEALTH +5 until end of turn.
"Now I am here, now I am not. And now you are dead." - Talin Tzin

name: Nyla Silvertongue
effect:
Mercenary • Bard • CHARISMA +4
Spend React: Before a character enters play: The character ignores any loyalty penalties.
"I never lie, Kerebrus. It's just that some men unfortunately read more into what I say to them than I actually said."

name: Once Again
effect: Order: Remove this card from the game: Retrieve a fighter action card from your discard pile and put it into your hand.
"Each time, the degenerate and unjust escape my wrath. No more. I shall strike against The Chosen." - Kerebrus

name: Pehtu Mennanakh
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Druid / Rathe
Adjacent Lycanthropes and Rangers gain POWERATTACK +5.
React: After Pehtu enters play: Shuffle a Lycanthrope from your discard pile into your deck.
"The Rathemen were thought to be no more." - Logan Ebonwoulfe

name: Phalanx
effect:
Tactics
Order: While there are three or more characters in this rank, all characters in this rank gain +2 AC and DEFEND +5 until end of turn.
"Yes, we know that trick as well, thralls." - Set'rokh

name: Poison Arrows
effect:
Arrow
May be equipped by Rangers, ignoring class restrictions.
This rogue's non-spell ranged strikes gain +2 to the die roll.
React: After target character is targeted with a non-spell ranged strike by this rogue, remove a card in your discard pile from the game: If the strike hits, the target gains the Poison trait until end of turn and must succeed with a poison save (DC 15) or become spent.

name: Potion of Strength
effect:
Potion
React: Before target character in this rank targets a melee strike, discard Potion of Strength: The target gains +4 ATK and POWERATTACK +5 until end of turn.

name: Potion of Vigor
effect: Order: Destroy Potion of Vigor: Unstun target character within one rank.
"No, it doesn't work the way you think it does!" - Niobe

name: Queen Yahia
effect:
Mercenary Warlord • Illusionist / Hag
Order: Twice per turn, target an opposing character within two ranks: The target must succeed with a Magic save (DC 14) or perform a melee strike against a target of your choice.
"To not pay proper respect may prove fatal, milord." - Gustave

name: Raclesis
effect:
Elf Warlord / Priest of Flesh
Opposing characters with the Poison trait suffer -2 ATK and Skill.
Order: Once per turn, target a character without the Poison trait within two ranks: Attach a card from your dicard pile face down to the target. While attached, the target gains the Poison trait and the text "After the ready phase: Succeed with a poison save (DC 12) or suffer a wound after spending until end of turn."

name: Rapid Regeneration
effect: Spend React: Before target character suffers wounds: Reduce the wounds by one. The target gains MEDICINE +7 until end of turn.
"Behold what is possible, free from the Elements' hunger!" - Raclesis

name: Redu Tam
effect:
The Chosen • Thrall
React: Before Tam is killed as part of an action's payment: If Tam does not have the Daemon trait, he is not killed but the cost is considered paid, and he permanently gains +5 ATK, -6 AC, +1 HP, and the Daemon and Planar traits. Remove all wounds from Tam.
"Service is rewarded." - Naram-Sin

name: Rellion Truebred
effect:
Steed
Order: Once per turn, spend Truebred: Move forward one rank.
Order: Once per turn, spend Truebred, discard a card: The next melee strike performed by this fighter this turn gains +4 ATK and inflicts an additional wound.
"Rellion's finest are bred both for strength and speed."

name: Remorna
effect:
Elf / Vaneris
Order: Once per turn, attach a card from your discard pile face down to Remorna: Perform a +4 ranged strike. This is a Water action and a spell.
React: Before Remorna is killed: Reveal all face down cards attached to Remorna. Shuffle all revealed spells into your deck. Remove all other revealed cards from the game.

name: Replenish
effect: Spend Order: Remove up to two wounds or attached action cards from target character you control within two ranks.
"What was taken from us, I shall restore." - Inquisitor Dmitir

name: Rid'ar'rak
effect:
Nothrog
React: Once per turn, after a character performs a Tactics action: Gain +4 ATK and POWERATTACK +5 until end of turn.
"Discipline is all. Forget allegiance, save to the warrior beside you, and curb your petty hatreds. I will define your wants from now on." - Set'rokh

name: Salvage
effect:
Dwarf
React: Once per turn, before target Dwarf is killed: Return an Armor, Shield or Weapon equipped to the target to its owner's hand.
"Nobody ever cleaned up these battlefields, makes me wonder why. We for sure need all we can get."

name: Sandbox
effect:
Unique
Spend React: Before your Warlord makes an initiative roll: He gains +5 to the roll. This is a Tactics action.
React: After you win initiative, destroy Sandbox: This fighter performs an Order.

name: Sandscoured Gargoyle
effect:
Dwarf • Gargoyle
Order: Once per turn spend a cleric: perform a melee strike.
"They are the forgotten ones - enduring out in the desert and waiting for the clans to return." - Thekk Rockbender

name: Sanga-Kish
effect:
The Chosen Warlord / Blood Maji
Spells cast by Sanga-Kish gain +2 DC and +2 to ranged strikes for each wound on him.
Order: Once per turn, inflict a wound on Sanga-Kish or kill a Thrall: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. You may choose a wizard spell and attach it to Sanga-Kish, as if it had been successfully scribed. Shuffle your deck.

name: Scaly Sycophant
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
Sycophant gains +1 HP while a Level 4 or higher Dragon is in play.
Sycophant gains +2 ATK, AC and Skill while a Treasure card is in play.

name: Scimitar
effect:
Weapon
React: After this fighter performs an attack: An adjacent character performs an attack, spending as normal.
"The traditional Thessyrian design. Even the gods could not change it." - Redu Tam

name: Scyrax' Spear Streamer
effect:
Nothrog • Siege
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Perform a +6 ranged strike.
React: After target character is hit with a ranged strike by Goduk: The strike inflicts no wounds. Move the target backward one rank.
"Lukkot would never have built that... thing." - Goza

name: Set for the Charge
effect:
React: After a character within one rank is targeted with a melee strike: Move forward or backward one rank.
Spend React: Before target stunned character falls forward into his front rank: The target suffers two wounds.

name: Set'rokh
effect:
Nothrog Warlord
Once per turn Set'rokh may perform a Tactics action without spending.
Spend Order: Once per turn target another non-stunned Nothrog you control: Move the target forward one rank or the target performs a melee strike. This is a Tactics action.
"Brawn is good. Brawn and Smarts is better."

name: Shards
effect:
Earth
Spend Order: Perform a +15 ranged strike. If the strike hits, the target may not have wounds reduced or removed until end of turn (including this strike).
"Dwarven wizardry in nothing to laugh at, boy!" - Fancy

name: Shirti
effect:
The Chosen • Thrall
Spend React: After a Thrall is killed by a character you control, creating an illegal second rank: Before fixing the illegal rank, move target Thrall in this rank forward one rank.
"Coming of age, they adopt a name mimicking the sounds of their totem animal, most often the tree snake." - Ursala Yscar

name: Shonta
effect:
The Chosen • Thrall • MEDICINE +2
Order: Once per turn: Target other non-Warlord Thrall gains +1 Level until end of turn.
"That little which the gods cannot give us, the forests can."

name: Sigurdur
effect:
Dwarf Warlord
Order: Twice per turn, equip a card from your hand face down to a Dwarf you control as War Axe, a Level 2 classless item with +3 ATK, the Weapon trait, and the ability "Spend Order: Perform a melee strike that inflict an additional wound."

name: Snegrob
effect:
Nothrog • STEALTH +5 / Goblin
Snegrob inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes against spent characters.
React: Once per turn, after Snegrob succeeds with a STEALTH check: Perform a melee strike.
"Scyrax sends me."

name: Spear
effect:
Weapon
React: After you win initiative: Perform a melee strike.
"It offers all you need for a great army: It has reach, it is cheap, and you need hardly any training for it." - Naram-Sin

name: Speed of the Falcon
effect:
Air
Spend Order: Target lower Level non-stunned character you control performs an attack without spending.
"Strive to emulate the bird in flight, young one, seizing upon your prey with no other thought in mind." - Pehtu

name: Spiked Spaulders
effect:
Armor
React: Twice per turn, after target character targets this fighter with a melee strike: The target must succeed with a Fortitude save (DC 12) or suffer a wound.
"The warrior who seeks to prevail on the battlefield seeks every advantage he can." - Set'rokh

name: Squire Cambrie
effect:
Deverenian • Paladin
React: After a Level 3 or higher Deverenian in this rank performs an attack: Squire Cambrie performs an attack, spending as normal
"For lack of noble scions even the bastards now are squired. What have we come to?" - Argen d'Ilchant

name: Staff of Storage
effect:
Weapon • 7 Charges
Order: Remove X Charges: Attach a Level X wizard spell to the staff.
Order: Remove a Charge, spend the Staff: Cast an attached spell (do not remove the spell from the Staff unless that is part of its effect).

name: Storm Stela
effect:
Weapon
Spend Order: Target an equal or lower Level character in the rank in front of this cleric: The target performs a melee strike.
"Behold the proof: The power of the Storm is on the rise again." - Inquisitor Dmitir

name: Sudden Reversal
effect:
Tactics
React: After target character in your front rank is targeted with a melee strike: Move this fighter forward one rank or within this rank, if possible. If this fighter is adjacent to the target, redirect the melee strike to this fighter, if possible.

name: Sunder
effect: Order: Target up to two items within two ranks, target the characters that have them equipped: Succeed with a skill check (DC 6 + twice the items' Levels) to destroy the items.
"You won't need those weapons in the mines, beast." - Atiratu

name: Suul
effect:
Elf • Scout / Vaneris
Spend Order: Perform two +4 ranged strikes. Each strike may target up to two additional ranks away, if the target has the Poison trait.
"Feel the Waves' teeth, human."

name: Swordman's Cape
effect:
Armor • RIPOSTE +4
This rogue may perform the RIPOSTE feat an additional time per turn.
"Catch your opponent off-balance or use it as a last resort - it's always good to have." - Talin Tzin

name: Talin Tzin
effect:
Free Kingdoms Warlord • RIPOSTE +3 / Narawat
Talin may perform the RIPOSTE feat twice per turn.
React: Up to three times per turn, after Talin performs a strike: Move forward or backward one rank.
"Kedric taught me to fight on quicksand."

name: Tears of the Storm
effect: Spend Order: Remove a wound from target character.
"The Storm can not be vanquished. It is gathering strength again." - Ghed Nuri

name: Teleport Object
effect: Order: Target an item equipped to target character within three ranks: Succeed with a Spellcraft check (DC 10 + the item's Level, +5 when targeting an opposing character) to return the item to its owner's hand.
"How nice of you to bring me a gift." - Yahia

name: Ter'til
effect:
Nothrog
React: After a character performs a Tactics action: Put Ter'til into play from your hand.
"Prepare the way ahead of my legion. The army needs you as its eyes. Wait for my signal before striking." - Set'rokh

name: The Giving
effect:
The Chosen • Thrall
React: Before The Giving is killed by a character you control, target any adjacent The Chosen: Until end of turn, the targets gain +4 ATK while performing a melee strike against a spent character.
"Some of the undomesticated yield more than ours." - Naram-Sin

name: The Slightest Cut
effect:
Assassins gain +1 Level for performing this action.
React: Before making a melee strike roll: If the target of the strike has one or more wounds, gain +5 ATK for the strike and the strike inflicts an additional wound.

name: Thibaud Rellion
effect:
Deverenian • Paladin / Rellion
Your Warlord gains +1 to initiative rolls.
React: Once per game, after winning initiative by 10 or more: Thibaud permanently gains +3 ATK, +3 AC, and +1 HP.
"Proper lances and oats are long gone."

name: Thorns of Anger
effect:
Shield
React: Once per turn, after target character is hit with a melee strike by this rogue: Until end of turn, any melee strikes performed by the target must target this rogue, if possible.
"The vendor told me it'd protect against all kinds of lizards, too. Does not. Dragons it just riles up." - Jonah the Burglar

name: Tiger Trap
effect:
Trap
React: After target opposing ready character moves into an adjacent rank without spending, spend Tiger Trap: The target must succeed with a Reflex save (DC 15) or become spent.

name: Twisted Hyenas
effect:
Mercenary • Monster
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Target character within one rank must succeed with a fear save (DC 13) or become spent.
"They are not content merely to feast upon carrion." - Azam

name: Uncertain Path
effect:
Air • 3 Charges
Spend Order: Attach this card to target character you control. While attached, the taget gains the ability, "Order: Remove a Charge from Uncertain Path: Move forward or backward one rank."

name: Uthanak's Ring
effect:
Unique
React: Before fixing an illegal rank, spend Uthanak's Ring: Move a character you control forward or backward one rank if the move will make the rank legal. This is a Tactics action.
"The ring made a brute into a general." - Set'rokh

name: Valdimar
effect:
Dwarf
React: Once per turn, after an adjacent Dwarf equips an item: Ready Valdimar.
"Too young to learn our secrets, yet he benefits from our craft." - Hallvardur

name: Valeria Tremayne
effect: Free Kingdoms • RIPOSTE +11
"It's you or me. You better make your first strike count, or I will."

name: Valhala's Shout
effect:
Tactics
Barbarians perform this action without spending.
Spend Order: Put one or more characters into play from your hand, in any order you choose.

name: Vels of Clan Manaka
effect:
Nothrog • Siege • 2 Charges / Stone Giant
May not equip items.
While Vels has no Charges he gains +6 ATK and inflicts an additional wound with melee strikes.
Spend Order: Remove a Charge: Perform a +7 ranged strike.
"Me luf when 'dem skweek like skoo'ered pigs."

name: Venom Vines
effect:
Earth
React: Before this wizard kills target opposing character: Until end of turn, characters in the front rank of the target's formation gain the Poison trait and suffer -2 ATK and AC. If this wizard is a Necromancer, you may put up to two Level 1 characters from your discard pile into play. Remove the target from the game after it dies.
"I hate Elves." - Set'rokh

name: Viper Whip
effect:
Level 4 or higher wizards perform this action without spending.
Spend Order: Perform a melee strike that may target an additional rank away. If the strike hits, spend the target before inflicting wounds. This strike does not gain any modifiers or effects from this wizard's items.

name: Wedge
effect:
Tactics
Order: While there are three or more characters in this rank, all characters in this rank gain +2 ATK and POWERATTACK +5 until end of turn.
"Put the strongest and fastest on point and let the others fan out from there and broaden the gap, all in one violent push." - Sir Robert of Andover

name: Whirling Swamp Spear
effect:
Weapon • Shield
React: After this rogue performs a melee strike that killed: Perform a +2 ranged strike. This is a Water action and a spell.
"Got this from a little nymph I netted myself. Does not work for me as well as the nymph did, though." - Scyrax

name: Wildman's Mail
effect:
Armor
React: Once per game, before target character is killed with a melee strike by this fighter: Wildman's Mail permanently gains an AC bonus equal to the target's HP. If this fighter is a Barbarian then Wildman's Mail also permanently gains an equal bonus to ATK. Remove the target from the game after it dies.

name: Winter's Shadow
effect:
Necromancers gain +2 Levels for performing this action.
React: After target opposing lower Level character enters play: The target may not attack or maneuver until end of turn.

name: Wythien
effect:
Elf • Ranger • STEALTH +8
Spend Order: Perform a +2 ranged strike.
"The screams of my enemies make me forget the pain in my bones."
